course_description: Overview of barrier islands, integrates geology and ecology to understand barrier islands as places denoted by dramatic and rapid change. Includes human-related factors related to barrier islands and effects of climate change. Weekend field trip to Georgia barrier islands. Fulfills ENVS Elective.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or  BIOL_OX 111 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
sections: Class Nbr: 2852, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Martin, Status: Open
